tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE DeviceData (
  data_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  device_id UUID,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  data_value FLOAT,
  FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES IoTDevices(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE IoT_devices (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(255),
    device_type VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE Sensor_data (
    sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    sensor_type VARCHAR(50),
    value FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES IoT_devices(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Alerts (
    alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    alert_type VARCHAR(50),
    alert_message TEXT,
    alert_time TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES Sensor_data(sensor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE devices (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(255),
    device_type VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    last_update TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE sensor_data (
    sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    sensor_type VARCHAR(50),
    sensor_value FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES devices(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE alerts (
    alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    alert_message TEXT,
    alert_time TIMESTAMP,
    severity INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES devices(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE commands (
    command_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    command_type VARCHAR(50),
    command_value VARCHAR(255),
    sent_time TIMESTAMP,
    response_time TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES devices(device_id)
);
CREATE TABLE DEVICE (id INT, device_name STRING, location STRING, device_type STRING, status STRING);
CREATE TABLE SENSOR (id INT, sensor_name STRING, device_id INT, data_type STRING, unit_of_measurement STRING, PRIMARY KEY (id), FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES DEVICE(id) ON DELETE CASCADE);
CREATE TABLE DATA_STREAM (id INT, sensor_id INT, timestamp TIMESTAMP, value FLOAT, PRIMARY KEY (id), FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES SENSOR(id) ON DELETE CASCADE);
CREATE TABLE ALERT (id INT, sensor_id INT, alert_type STRING, value_threshold FLOAT, timestamp TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (id), FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES SENSOR(id) ON DELETE CASCADE);
CREATE TABLE DECISION (id INT, alert_id INT, decision_time TIMESTAMP, action_taken STRING, PRIMARY KEY (id), FOREIGN KEY (alert_id) REFERENCES ALERT(id) ON DELETE CASCADE);
